left.oneDignity: We gift to each other and give thanks with Gradido.
left.oneDonation: You are a gift for the community. 1000 thanks because you are with us.
left.oneGratitude: For each other, for all people, for nature.

community.myContributions: My contributions to the common good
community.openContributionLinkText: The following {count} automatic creations are currently provided by the "{name}" community.

alert.communityNoteList: Here you will find all submitted and confirmed contributions from all members of this community.
alert.myContributionNoteList: You can edit or delete entries that have not yet been confirmed at any time.
alert.in_progress: Es gibt eine Rückfrage der Moderatoren.

contribution.deleted: The contribution has been deleted! But it will remain visible.

formText.bringYourTalentsTo: Bring your talents to the community! Your voluntary commitment will be rewarded with 20 GDD per hour up to a maximum of 1,000 GDD per month.
formText.describeYourCommunity: Describe your community service activity with hours and enter an amount of 20 GDD per hour! After confirmation by a moderator, the amount will be credited to your account.
formText.maxGDDforMonth: You can only submit a maximum of {amount} GDD for the selected month.
formText.openAmountForMonth: For {monthAndYear}, you can still submit {creation} GDD.
formText.yourContribution: Your contribution to the common good

contribution.noDateSelected: Choose any date in the month

decay.before_startblock_transaction: This transaction does not include decay.

error.email-already-sent: We already sent you an email less than 10 minutes ago.
error.empty-transactionlist: There was an error with the transmission of the number of your transactions.
error.no-account: Unfortunately we could not find an (activated) account to the given data.
error.no-transactionlist: Unfortunately, there was an error. No transactions have been sent from the server.
error.session-expired: The session was closed for security reasons.

form.no_gdd_available: You do not have GDD to send.
form.scann_code: QR Code Scanner - Scan the QR Code of your partner
form.send_check: Confirm your transaction. Please check all data again!
form.send_transaction_error: Unfortunately, the transaction could not be executed!

validation.gddSendAmount: The {_field_} field must be a number between {min} and {max} with at most two digits after the decimal point
validation.is-not: You cannot send Gradidos to yourself
validation.usernmae-regex: The username must start with a letter, followed by at least two alphanumeric characters.

gdd_per_link.choose-amount: Select an amount that you would like to send via link. You can also enter a message. Click 'Generate now' to create a link that you can share.
gdd_per_link.credit-your-gradido: For the Gradido to be credited, click on the link!
gdd_per_link.has-account: You already have a Gradido account?
gdd_per_link.isFree: Gradido is free of charge worldwide.
gdd_per_link.link-and-text-copied: The link and your message have been copied to the clipboard. You can now include it in an email or message.
gdd_per_link.link-copied: Link has been copied to the clipboard. You can now paste it into an email or message.
gdd_per_link.link-expired: The link is no longer valid. The validity expired on {date}.
gdd_per_link.link-hint: Attention: Anyone can redeem this link. Please do not share it!
gdd_per_link.no-account: You don't have a Gradido account yet?
gdd_per_link.no-redeem: You not allowed to redeem your own link!
gdd_per_link.not-copied: Unfortunately, your device does not allow copying! Please copy the link by hand!
gdd_per_link.redeem-text: Do you want to redeem the amount now?
gdd_per_link.redeemed: Successfully redeemed! Your account has been credited with {n} GDD.
gdd_per_link.redeemed-at: The link was already redeemed on {date}.

gdt.no-transactions: You do not have Gradido Transform (GDT) yet.
gdt.not-reachable: The GDT Server is not reachable.
gdt.publisher: A member you referred has paid a contribution

link-load: Load the last link | Load the last {n} links |  Load more {n} links

message.activateEmail: Your account has not been activated yet. Please check your emails and click the activation link or order a new activation link over the password reset page.
message.checkEmail: Your email has been successfully verified. You can sign in now.
message.email: We have sent you an email.
message.register: You are registered now, please check your emails and click the activation link.
message.title: Thank you!
message.unsetPassword: Your password has not been set yet. Please set it again.

session.lightText: If you have not performed any action for more than 10 minutes, you will be logged out for security reasons.

language.success: Your language has been successfully updated.

name.change-success: Your name has been successfully changed.

newsletter.newsletterFalse: You will not receive any information by email.
newsletter.newsletterTrue: You will receive information by email.

password.resend_subtitle: Your activation link has expired, here you can order a new one.

reset-password.text: Enter a new password that you will use to log in to your Gradido account in the future..

set-password.text: Now save your new password, which you can use to log in to your Gradido account in the future.

password.subtitle: If you have forgotten your password, you can reset it here.

forgotPassword.heading: Please enter the email address by which you're registered here.

login.heading: Log in with your access data. Keep them safe!

resetPassword.heading: Please enter your password and repeat it.
